author: Craig Northacker
content: I find it fascinating when something happens no one is to blame. Yet it happened anyway. How did 2 US Navy destroyers wind up in collisions in the Pacific at a time when the maritime service companies were embroiled in a huge fraud? Pieces were put into play whether it is incompetence, faulty wiring that should have been discovered on testing, on the US ships people were “not” trained properly and /or were asleep at the switch. Are you kidding me? I’m just an old NCO, but I made sure my team was ready to rock and roll.
